item.title: Uploading Strategies
item.description: How to upload data to the platform There are two ways of uploading data to the platform: Secure File Transfer Protocol (SFTP) GraphQL mutation Secure File Transfer Protocol (SFTP) SFTP, or Secure File Transfer Protocol, is a network protocol that provides a secure access, transfer, and management of data files programmatically. This protocol is used by the largest organizations in finance, technology, and consulting to transfer data such as Personally Identifiable Information (PII) to ensure it remains 100% secure.
